channel.title: Upgrade 12.5 to 12.6 error
channel.description: Hi, I had Debian 12.5+Kicksecure+Gnome I upgraded to Debian 12.6 by `apt dist-upgrade -y` and it is showing me "A problem has occurred and the system can’t recover. Please contact a system administrator.” What should I do now? Thanks in advance!

item.title: Upgrade 12.5 to 12.6 error
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Nevermind, by default, autologin was enabled. I disabled and restarted it, all fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade 12.5 to 12.6 error
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Hi,
I had Debian 12.5+Kicksecure+Gnome
I upgraded to Debian 12.6 by apt dist-upgrade -y and it is showing me "A problem has occurred and the system can’t recover. Please contact a system administrator.”
What should I do now?
Thanks in advance!
